name: Turd Flipper 3
description:
• Turd Flipper 3 is finally here, and better than ever.
  • Flip Turds to earn coins and gems, and furthur upgrade your technology to be able to flip EVEN. MORE.
  • New LEADERBOARD, to compete against your friends!

Use code 'ezmoney' to quick start your gameplay!

(DO NOT exit game by force closing it: Use the 'close' button at the top right to save!)
